name: LumiaStream
0:
”Alexa open lumia stream”
”ask lumia stream to change to green”
”ask lumia stream to change to color red with brightness one hundred and transition one thousand”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lumia stream
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Lumia Stream gives viewers the ability to control your Smart Lights, Smart Devices, and various related software through chat and alerts.
Lumia Stream integrates with top brands in the smart device world including, but not limited to Philips Hue, Nanoleaf, LifX, Yeelight, Cololight, TPLink Kasa, Elgato Light Strip, Elgato Key Light, Tuya, Smart Life, Magichome, Corsair, Razer, and Steelseries.
Lumia Stream connects to popular softwares as well that consists of OBS, SLOBS, Streamlabs, StreamElements, TipeeeStream, DonorDrive, Extra Life, Tiltify, TreatStream, and Patreon.
Lumia Stream has the ability to also control devices in the music industry using protocols: MIDI, OSC, and even Artnet.
